text.text1: Forgot your password? Enter your email address below.
text.text2: If your address matches a known address, we will send you an email.
text.text3: You will be automatically redirected to the home page once the form is validated.

what-is-it.title: CODEWHAREHOUSE, WHAT IS IT ?
what-is-it.text1: Discover a simple and efficient solution to share your code online.
what-is-it.text2: Whether you are a student or a teacher, we help you share your creations while allowing you to exchange with others.

easy-and-fast.title: EASY & FAST
easy-and-fast.text: Share in a few clicks on our editor code in a few seconds! As easy as copy/paste!

space.title: MANAGE YOUR SPACE
space.text: Decide yourself if you want your code to be visible to others and/or if they can modify it.

visit.title: EXPLORE
visit.text: Our solution is perfect for sharing code online with students.

link.subscribe: New to this site? Register here

error.password-size: Your password must be between 8 and 16 characters long !
error.token-invalid: An error has occurred. The token has expired or is invalid !
error.project-description: A description of the project is required !
error.project-visibility: Define if your project is public or private !

success.account-created: Your account has been created, we will redirect you in a few seconds!
success.password-recover: Your password has been changed, you will be redirected in a moment.

label.code: Copy your code here, or just write something down. You will be able to edit it in the editor by clicking on Editor View after creation
label.commentary: Comments or notes on the code...
label.project-description: A brief description of the project...
